switchy.modules.switchy_compat.apoli.des: A module that switches power data from Apace's Apoli.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.apoli.ena: Power data will be saved alongside each presets' origins.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.apoli.dis: Powers will be created fresh when switching presets with different origins.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.apoli.war: All power data (resources, extra inventory, etc.) for other presets' origins will be dropped/lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.drogtor.d: A module that switches nicknames from unascribed's Drogtor The Nickinator.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.drogtor.e: You will be able to set nicknames per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.drogtor.d: You will share a single nickname across all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.drogtor.w: All other nicknames will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.hidearmor: A module that switches hidden armor from unascribed's Fabrication's /hidearmor.
/hidearmor will change armor visibility for all presets.
All other /hidearmor settings will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.fabrictai: A module that switches player skins from samolego's Fabric Tailor.
You will be able to set a skin per-preset.
You will share a single skin across all presets.
All other overridden skins will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.origins.d: A module that switches layered Origins from Apace's Origins.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.origins.e: You will be able to have an origin (or layered set) for each preset. BYO Orbs of Origin.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.origins.d: You will share one set of origins across all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.origins.w: All other sets of origins will be lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.pehkui.de: A module that switches scale values (e.g. sizes) from Virtuoel's Pehkui.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.pehkui.en: Scale changes will apply only to the current preset.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.pehkui.di: Scale changes will apply regardless of the current preset.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.pehkui.wa: All other scale values wil be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.arcpocaly: A module that switches nekoarc state contents from Arathain's Arcpocalypse.
You will have your neco-arc transformation contained to each preset.
Neco-arc transformations will apply to all presets.
All other neco-arc transformations (or lack thereof) will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.hexcastin: A module that switches the internalized pigment from petrak@'s Hex Casting.
You will have one internalized pigment per-preset.
You will share a single internalized pigment over all presets.
All other pigments will be cleared!
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.lanyard.d: A module that switches lanyard contents from Pyrrha's Lanyard.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.lanyard.e: You will have individual lanyard contents per-preset.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.lanyard.d: You will have the same lanyard contents on all presets.
switchy.modules.switchy_compat.lanyard.w: All other lanyard contents will be cleared!
